scripts.deploy: npm run gh-pages && npm run master
scripts.gh-pages: git add . && git commit -m "update on `date +"%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S"`" && git push origin gh-pages; exit 0
scripts.font: npm run noto && npm run spo
scripts.font-kr: git clone https://github.com/hyunseob/noto-sans-kr ./themes/overdose/source/libs/noto-sans-kr && git clone https://github.com/perfectacle/spoqa-han-sans-kr ./themes/overdose/source/libs/spoqa-han-sans-kr && node rm-git
scripts.spo: git clone https://github.com/perfectacle/spoqa-han-sans-kr ./themes/overdose/source/libs/spoqa-han-sans-kr && git clone https://github.com/perfectacle/spoqa-han-sans-jp ./themes/overdose/source/libs/spoqa-han-sans-jp && node rm-git
